CcsdsGFlag.description: Sequence Flags of CCSDS Packet Header

CcsdsCounter.description: Sequence counter of CCSDS TM packet header

CcsdsPLength.description: Packet Length of CCSDS Packet Header

AlertTimeTbAbsSeconds.description: absolute time of beginning of burst - seconds part

AlertTimeTbAbsMicroseconds.description: absolute time of beginning of burst - microseconds part

AlertTimeTb.description: time of beginning of burst in UGTS local time

AlertSlewRequest.description: slew request sent to platform to perform slew to source direction

AlertSkyTheta.description: source localization in ECLAIRs reference frame - theta angle

AlertSkyPhi.description: source localization in ECLAIRs reference frame - phi angle

AlertCatSrcNum.description: source number in catalog (0=not in catalog)

AlertSkyIPix.description: source pixel I coordinate in ECLAIRs reference frame

AlertSkyJPix.description: source pixel J coordinate in ECLAIRs reference frame

AlertSkyIFit.description: source localization I coordinate in ECLAIRs reference frame

AlertSkyJFit.description: source localization J coordinate in ECLAIRs reference frame

AlertSkyCnt.description: counts at source position in sky

AlertSkyCntFit.description: fitted counts at source position in sky

AlertSkyVar.description: variance at source position in sky

AlertTriggerCriterium.description: code for detection zone (1 to 9)+energy band+ time scale + trigger type(TBC)

AlertDetCounts.description: detection counts in energy band, zone, time scale

AlertDetBkg.description: estimated detection background counts in energy band, zone, time scale

SatPositionX.description: satellite position X in J2000 as in PVT message

SatPositionY.description: satellite position Y in J2000 as in PVT message

SatPositionZ.description: satellite position Z in J2000 as in PVT message

SatAttitudeQ0.description: estimated satellite attitude quaternion as in AAV message Q0

SatAttitudeQ1.description: estimated satellite attitude quaternion as in AAV message Q1

SatAttitudeQ2.description: estimated satellite attitude quaternion as in AAV message Q2

SatAttitudeQ3.description: estimated satellite attitude quaternion as in AAV message Q3

SatAttQuality.description: quality of pointing stability as in AAV message

CcsdsApid.description: First 2 bytes of telemetry packet determined by packet type and APID

CcsdsGFlag.description: Sequence Flags of CCSDS Packet Header

CcsdsCounter.description: Sequence counter of CCSDS TM packet header

CcsdsPLength.description: Packet Length of CCSDS Packet Header

AlertTimeTb0AbsSeconds.description: absolute time of beginning of burst - seconds part

AlertTimeTb0AbsMilliseconds.description: absolute time of beginning of burst - milliseconds part

LightCurvePacketNumber.description: packet number in light curve sequence

SatAttitudeLCQ0.description: estimated satellite attitude quaternion for light curve Q0

SatAttitudeLCQ1.description: estimated satellite attitude quaternion for light curve Q1

SatAttitudeLCQ2.description: estimated satellite attitude quaternion for light curve Q2

SatAttitudeLCQ3.description: estimated satellite attitude quaternion for light curve Q3

Sample0Eband0IntCount.description: Integral counter value since last packet (first one=0)

Sample0Eband1IntCount.description: Integral counter value since last packet (first one=0)

Sample0Eband2IntCount.description: Integral counter value since last packet (first one=0)

Sample0Eband3IntCount.description: Integral counter value since last packet (first one=0)

Sample0EsatIntCount.description: Integral counter value since last packet (first one=0)

Sample0MultipleIntCount.description: Integral counter value since last packet (first one=0)

Sample1Eband0DiffCount.description: Differential counter value since time of Sample0

Sample1Eband1DiffCount.description: Differential counter value since time of Sample0

Sample1Eband2DiffCount.description: Differential counter value since time of Sample0

Sample1Eband3DiffCount.description: Differential counter value since time of Sample0

Sample1EsatDiffCount.description: Differential counter value since time of Sample0

Sample1MultipleDiffCount.description: Differential counter value since time of Sample0

Sample2Eband0DiffCount.description: Differential counter value since time of Sample1

Sample2Eband1DiffCount.description: Differential counter value since time of Sample1

Sample2Eband2DiffCount.description: Differential counter value since time of Sample1

Sample2Eband3DiffCount.description: Differential counter value since time of Sample1

Sample2EsatDiffCount.description: Differential counter value since time of Sample1

Sample2MultipleDiffCount.description: Differential counter value since time of Sample1

Sample3Eband0DiffCount.description: Differential counter value since time of Sample2

Sample3Eband1DiffCount.description: Differential counter value since time of Sample2

Sample3Eband2DiffCount.description: Differential counter value since time of Sample2

Sample3Eband3DiffCount.description: Differential counter value since time of Sample2

Sample3EsatDiffCount.description: Differential counter value since time of Sample2

Sample3MultipleDiffCount.description: Differential counter value since time of Sample2
